definitions.definition: One or two rings of tooth -like appendages surrounding the opening of the capsule of many mosses .
The parts of or surrounding the mouths of numerous invertebrates .
The lip , or edge of the aperture , of a spiral shell .

main_definition: ( botany ) One or two rings of tooth -like appendages surrounding the opening of the capsule of many mosses .
secondary_definitions: ( zoology ) The parts of or surrounding the mouths of numerous invertebrates .
The lip , or edge of the aperture , of a spiral shell .
